data.title: Lyle Lovett's Wife: He Was Married to Julia Roberts & Now Has a Family with April Kimble
data.meta_description: Renowned singer Lyle Lovett and his beautiful wife have been married for six years. Since they tied the knot, Lovett and his spouse have enjoyed a meaningful relationship and a happy family together.
data.text:
Renowned singer Lyle Lovett and his beautiful wife have been married for six years. Since they tied the knot, Lovett and his spouse have enjoyed a meaningful relationship and a happy family together.

Advertisement

Celebrated musician Lyle Lovett has achieved remarkable success in the music industry and also discovered profound purpose and joy as a family man.

Throughout his life, the acclaimed singer has been married twice, yet in his second marriage, he has found an unparalleled sense of fulfillment and contentment as a husband and father.

Lyle Lovett attends Willie: Life and Songs of an American Outlaw at Bridgestone Arena on January 12, 2019, in Nashville, Tennessee. | Source: Getty Images

Lyle Lovett Has Been Married to His Second Wife since 2017

Lyle Lovett has been happily married to his second wife, April Kimble, since 2017. Together, they welcomed their twin children, Will and Ella. Lovett reflected on fatherhood and married life, saying:

"I've been especially grateful for getting to spend every moment of those two years with them."

Advertisement

Lovett expressed deep gratitude for experiencing something significant at this stage of his life and his musical career. In 2022, he delighted his fans by releasing his latest album, "12th of June."

Lyle Lovett and April Kimble attend "The Opposite of Sex" Santa Monica Premiere at Laemmle's Monica 4-plex on May 19, 1998, in Santa Monica, California. | Source: Getty Images

His twin children served as inspiration for the songs on the album, which he wrote during the pandemic. The album also marks his first release of original material in 10 years. His previous album, "Release Me," dates back to 2012.

Prior to his union to April Kimble, Lyle Lovett first married actress Julia Roberts in 1993.

Lyle Lovett and April Kimble arrive for the 1998 Kennedy Center Honors on December 5, 1998, in Washington, DC. | Source: Getty Images

Advertisement

According to Lovett, the long gap between his latest album and his previous release resulted from being between record deals and taking time to release his upcoming tracks.

During this period, the musician also experienced major personal milestones, such as marrying his longtime girlfriend, Kimble, and welcoming their twins into the world.

Lyle Lovett and April Kimble at the Rockefeller Center Motorcycle Show in 2004. | Source: Getty Images

Lyle Lovett's Wife April Kimble Is a Producer and a 'Wonderful Cook'

Lyle Lovett's wife, April Kimble, is a talented producer and music supervisor/consultant. She has an impressive track record, having contributed her expertise to various films such as "Kilimanjaro," "X/Y," "Jess + Moss," and "The Dry Land."

Advertisement

In addition to her successful career, Kimble excels as a master of the art of cooking. Lovett said his wife is a "wonderful cook," turning simple dishes into incredible culinary experiences.

Lyle Lovett and April Kimble arrive at the "All Over the Guy" screening during the Houston Gay and Lesbian Film Festival at the Museum of Fine Arts Houston on May 30, 2001, in Houston, Texas. | Source: Getty Images

In the spring and summer, the couple enjoys grilling prime beef. Lovett has developed a fondness for Kimble's dishes, particularly filets and ribeye served alongside fresh vegetables.

When she is not occupied with cooking or working, Kimble relishes attending several events with her husband throughout the country, such as those held in New York, California, and Houston.

Lyle Lovett and April Kimble attend the 12th annual "Forces for Nature" gala benefit at Pier Sixty at Chelsea Piers on April 15, 2010, in New York City. | Source: Getty Images

Advertisement

Lyle Lovett Had a Brief Marriage with Actress Julia Roberts

Prior to his union to April Kimble, Lyle Lovett first married actress Julia Roberts in 1993. They first met on the set of the 1992 film "The Player." Roberts was 25; Lovett was 35.

Roberts, a longtime fan of Lovett's music before they even met, explained that she first encountered Lovett through a mutual friend. However, her unexpected marriage to Lovett sparked doubt among the public regarding its authenticity.

The former couple's marriage eventually came under media scrutiny when Roberts sparked intense controversy after being spotted dancing with actor Ethan Hawke at a business dinner.

Lyle Lovett and Julia Roberts attend the opening night of The 31st Annual New York Film Festival in 1993 in New York. | Source: Getty Images

Advertisement

In the spring of 1995, after being together for almost two years, the couple jointly announced their separation. Their statement emphasized that they would remain close and support one another.

Roberts later stated in 1999 that her marriage with Lovett was not a mistake but rather a "miscalculation," considering the numerous positive occurrences that followed. Additionally, she emphasized that their split was "ridiculously amicable."

Lyle Lovett and Julia Roberts attend "The Pelican Brief" Westwood Premiere on December 13, 1993, at the Mann Bruin Theatre in Westwood, California. | Source: Getty Images

She went on to date several Hollywood A-listers, including Liam Neeson and Dylan McDermott. Her most notable ex-boyfriend was Benjamin Bratt, but unfortunately, their relationship did not work out.

Roberts found love again and married cinematographer Danny Moder, also in 2002. Together, they have three children: twins Hazel, Phinnaeus, and Henry Moder.
